caption.p: Direct protein–protein and protein–compound interactions between human targets of kaempferol. This figure was constructed using the default settings of the STITCH database ( http://stitch.embl.de/). The uridine 5’-diphospho-glucuronosyltransferase (UGT), aryl hydrocarbon receptor (AHR), and cytochrome P450 family 1 subfamily B member 1 (CYP1B1) proteins groups are dominant.
